interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Chappaquiddick
Review Date: 2018/07/20
Categories: Suspense, Drama, Compelling, Emotional
Product Description: ["Ted Kennedy's life and political career become derailed in the aftermath of a fatal car accident in 1969 that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne."]
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['John Curran'], 'Producers': ['Chris Cowles', 'Campbell McInnes', 'Mark Ciardi'], 'Starring': ['Kate Mara', 'Ed Helms', 'Jason Clarke']}
Review Text: This is a pretty good movie, it did hold my attention. I love history and have always been intrigued by the Kennedy family, this movie brought out a lot of facts about this incident that I previously had not known. I found it very interesting.
Review Title: This is a pretty good movie
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

description: Ted Kennedy's life and political career become derailed in the aftermath of a fatal car accident in 1969 that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne.
